question.body: Which of the following is the correct output?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Decide, based upon the p-value, if the null value should be included in the confidence interval. Please try again.
Incorrect. Decide, based upon the p-value, if the null value should be included in the confidence interval. Please try again.
Correct. With a p-value of 0.005, the interval should not contain the null value of 45,000.
Incorrect. Decide, based upon the p-value, if the null value should be included in the confidence interval. Please try again.
Incorrect. Decide, based upon the p-value, if the null value should be included in the confidence interval. Please try again.
